General.Name: Yuhwa Sec
General.Description: Yuhwa Securities co.,ltd. provides securities brokerage services in South Korea. The company offers capital raising and corporate financing services; advisory services related to mergers and acquisitions, spin-off, business transfer, etc.; private equity funds; real estate PF financial advisory services; and structured financing products. Yuhwa Securities co.,ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Yuhwa Securities Building, Seoul, South Korea
